experience: You and Scott both know Dr. DARRELL RICHARDSON, Mission Critical Ops, Amanda Vega, and 123 others
I'm Hiring for Admissions in Tempe!

As the Sr. IT recruiter, I found the best talent to support development of the Matrix mobile tablet platform, which integrates Geo-spatial Analysis, Business Intelligence, and Custom Business solutions with real time reporting. I developed and implemented recruiting strategies designed to target the passive professional in addition to working with agencies to staff for full time and contract employees nationwide.
San Francisco - Silicon Valley - Phoenix - Los Angeles - Las Vegas

CDI Corp. (NYSE:CDI) is an integrated, market-leading engineering and technology services organization providing differentiated, client focused solutions in select global industries for more than 60 years. Through its Global Staffing Services division, CDI Corporation delivers technology and engineering staffing services to leading companies with operations around the world. Our recruiters combine their in-depth understanding of the industry with the knowledge of who is who in almost any discipline.As a Professional Placement Recruiter I'm responsible for sourcing candidates via cold calling, market research and other creative, proactive techniques and for providing full life cycle recruiting support for IT job openings. I also partner with Delivery Executives, Fulfillment, and Account Managers to help clients meet their short and long-term business objectives, while meeting CDI’s strategic business goals.
Student@Rockit Bootcamp - Front End Web Development

10-week, instructor-led course that covered the essentials needed to develop front-end web technologies. I learned advanced skills in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery and other front-end frameworks used to develop interactive websites and dynamic web applications. It was a hands-on, project-based course where I learned to code in an accelerated time frame by applying my skills to develop WordPress and Jekyll websites.
Senior Director, Operations and Human Resources

In this role, my operational responsibilities included the management of several workflows across numerous client verticals.  I ensured resources were directed to complete the deployment of new processes, devices, and network infrastructure while phasing out legacy hardware and circuits in a timely, cost effective manner.  HR responsibilities included the creation/management of all HR processes and talent acquisition with a focus on attracting and retaining senior network engineering/architecture/security personnel to staff local, national, and international positions.
